title: Herbivorous
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;"
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||[[Chunk]]s inedible, [[ration]]s provide less nutrition.||You are a herbivore.
|-
| colspan="3" |
'''Species notes:''' [[Spriggan]]s start at rank 1.
|-
| colspan="3" |
*This mutation was removed in [[0.26]].
*Prior to [[0.21]], this mutation had three levels.
*Prior to [[0.15]], characters could become partially or completely herbivorous through mutations.
|- style="font-style:italic;"
| colspan="3" |
[[Bad mutations|Bad mutation]]
|}
